Name: Fifty.ServerUtilities [FSU]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements helper functions used by other mods.

Dependencies:
  - Northstar

ConVars.Name: FSU_PREFIX_SYSTEM_MESSAGES
ConVars.HelpString: Whether system messages should be prefixed with '[FSU]'.

ConVars.Name: FSU_COLOR_THEME
ConVars.HelpString: Custom chat UI colors. Supported color types are: header, highlight, text, admin, owner, error, success, announce. To change a color, enter the name, an equals sign and a color code without '\x1b'. The order does not matter and you can enter just the ones you want to change. Separate each color definition with a comma. You can find ANSI color codes here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code#Colors
